channel.title: How do i spwn npcs?
channel.description: how do i spwn npcs? i am so confused! :confused: If any one could help me post now! :D

item.title: How do i spwn npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Gltich Legit Gltich
item.description:
@Legit_Gltich wrote:

Use this if you want the NPC to always be there

[quote=“shaza, post:3, topic:251596”]To add npcs open up autospawn.cfg
I’m going to use Hans u can use any npc you want or like.

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn= 0 #### #### 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans

The first word says npcid now choose and npc id you like. The coordx and cordy are were u want the npc to spawn u can spawn at at these places if you want to try.

x=2962 y=3381 - Falador
x=3223 y=3218 - Lumbridge
x= 3093 y= 3493 - Edgeville

Replace the #### to the x coordinate and the #### to the y coordinate u want it to be.
Now save as,Then compile.

Then run your server hope it works :p[/quote]

Use this if you want an NPC there until someone kills it

[quote=“AsianTony4, post:4, topic:251596”]If ur talking about just spawning a regular npc when ur playing the game then use the command ::npc (npc id) .

If not then do what shaza said.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i spwn npcs?
item.dc:creator: @AsianTony4 AsianTony4
item.description:
@AsianTony4 wrote:

If ur talking about just spawning a regular npc when ur playing the game then use the command ::npc (npc id) .

If not then do what shaza said.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i spwn npcs?
item.dc:creator: @shaza shaza
item.description:
@shaza wrote:

To add npcs open up autospawn.cfg
I’m going to use Hans u can use any npc you want or like.

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn= 0 #### #### 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hans

The first word says npcid now choose and npc id you like. The coordx and cordy are were u want the npc to spawn u can spawn at at these places if you want to try.

x=2962 y=3381 - Falador
x=3223 y=3218 - Lumbridge
x= 3093 y= 3493 - Edgeville

Replace the #### to the x coordinate and the #### to the y coordinate u want it to be.
Now save as,Then compile.

Then run your server hope it works

Read full topic
